two deep - learning systems.from sentence: In this paper , we present two deep - learning systems that competed at SemEval - 2017 Task 4 .

designed for addressing.from sentence: Our first model is designed for addressing the problem of messagelevel sentiment analysis .

2 - layer Bidirectional LSTM.from sentence: We employ a 2 - layer Bidirectional LSTM , equipped with an attention mechanism .

topic - based sentiment analysis tasks.from sentence: For the topic - based sentiment analysis tasks , we propose a Siamese Bidirectional LSTM with a contextaware attention mechanism .
